db:abstract.db:para: Demonstrates the spatial audio functionality provided by Qt.

db:article.db:para: The Qt Spatial Audio module provides cross-platform capabilities to add support for spatial audio to Qt based applications.
The examples listed below show some typical use cases where audio sources are located in 3D space adding virtual rooms around the source.

db:listitem.db:para: Shows some of the capabilities of the spatial audio engine in Qt.
